title: $560/week – 450sqft – Lombard Apartment Style Living with NO lease! Co
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Check out WHY we are Different & Better than an apartment:
Mention this ad and get a Monthly Rate (28 days) of $2250 + tax & Weekly Rate (7 days) of $560 + tax!
Looking for a place to call home for a couple months or longer?
We have everything you need without the hassles of traditional apartments, all at a great rate.
Each room comes with a fully equipped kitchen and plenty of workspace.
And unlike apartments, cable and Wi-Fi are already hooked up and free!
With no leases and no credit checks, we are move-in ready.
So just bring yourself – and your furry family member – and feel right at home.
o	Great, all-inclusive prices.
Pay Weekly OR Monthly
o	SAVE HUNDREDS EVERY MONTH!
o	NO LEASE – move out when it fits your schedule
o	FREE UTILITIES - electric, A/C & Heat,
o	FREE Wi-Fi
o	FREE Cable TV,
o	FREE incoming calls
o	FREE parking
o	FREE Bi-weekly housekeeping so you can RELAX MORE
o	FULL KITCHENS – Stove/Oven, Full-Size Microwaves, Full-Size Refrigerator/Freezer, Dishwasher
o	Fully furnished and ready to move in
o	On-site Laundry – Open 24/7 to all guests
o	Outdoor grill area
o	Outdoor basketball court
o	Coffee Service and Grab-n-Go breakfast in lobby every morning
o	Snack/Drink vending 24/7
o	Pet friendly – Up to 2 dogs with Pet Fee
Call or stop in for a TOUR NOW and see why we are THE BEST VALUE in town!
Local nearby attractions include:
•	Less than a mile from Yorktown Mall and only three miles from Oakbrook Center!
•	Brookfield Zoo
•	Morton Arboretum
•	Lots of excellent choices for Foodies!
Less than a mile from Capital Grill, Rock Bottom Restaurant & Brewery, Weber Grill Restaurant, Brio Italian Grill, The Patio, RA Sushi Bar, Blueberry Hill Breakfast Café, and many more!
•	Only a 10-minute drive from College of DuPage
This offer is for new guests only!
Offer expires in 7 days!
Call in and mention offer code: ES2001
